title: RD - Babbitt Officer Reveal, Nevermind & Crystal Magnum
itunes:title: RD - Babbitt Officer Reveal, Nevermind & Crystal Magnum
description:
Adam and Mark connect for a surprise mid-week Best Hour in the Universe as they discuss the impending interview of the Capitol Police officer who shot Ashli Babbitt with Lester Holt and what legal advice Mark might give him. They also touch on the lawsuit being brought by the Nirvana baby and give an update on someone connected with the infamous Duke lacrosse case.

Watch this episode on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe to that channel, the exclusive home of Reasonable Doubt

Please Support Our Sponsors:
Geico.com
BetterHelp.com/ReasonableDoubt
ReliefBand.com - Promo code: Doubt
